description: This file defines themes for a Flutter app, including color schemes, theme data for light and dark modes, and UI styling details such as app bar, cards, buttons, input decorations, and navigation bar themes.

methods.name: buildLightTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object configured for light mode, with custom color schemes and style overrides.

methods.name: buildDarkTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object configured for dark mode, with custom color schemes and style overrides.
